abstract: Disney concluded an internal investigation and cleared Steven P. Jobs of any misconduct in issuing backdated stock options at Pixar.
snippet: Disney concluded an internal investigation and cleared Steven P. Jobs of any misconduct in issuing backdated stock options at Pixar.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company, concluding an internal investigation, cleared Steven P. Jobs yesterday of any misconduct in issuing backdated stock options at Pixar, the computer animation studio that Disney bought last year.

headline.main: Disney Inquiry on Pixar Grants Finds No Misconduct by Jobs
headline.print_headline: Disney Inquiry on Pixar Grants Finds No Misconduct by Jobs
